slogan: Connect trusted people, share your created value.
project_intro_content: Bondly is a SocialFi platform driven by decentralized finance (DeFi) and social networks. It builds a new social ecosystem where 'interaction is asset, reputation is credit' through staking, social identity, content financialization, and progressive wallet architecture.
vision1: Empower users with sovereignty over content and social assets
vision2: Enable measurable and tradable behavioral value
vision3: Build a user-driven decentralized social platform
